title: Student Management System
shortDescription: A comprehensive student management system built using C with AI-assisted development techniques.
fullDescription: A complete Student Management System developed in C programming language with the help of AI techniques. Features include student registration, record management, grade tracking, attendance monitoring, and report generation. The system demonstrates strong fundamentals in data structures, file handling, and structured programming.

title: Power BI Dashboard
shortDescription: Interactive business intelligence dashboard created as part of Power BI certification.
fullDescription: An interactive business intelligence dashboard built with Power BI as part of the Skill Nation certification program. Features include data modeling, DAX formulas, interactive visualizations, and insightful reports that help in data-driven decision making.
